alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 9:43AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern St. Louis and northwestern Lake Counties through 1015 AM CDT... At 942 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 25 miles north of Basswood Lake, to near Lake Vermilion, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. Dangerous Lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Tunderstorms will be near... Robinson around 1000 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Burntside Lake, Ely, Winton, Fall Lake and White Iron Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake
